name: Winner is King
description:
Title: Winner is King

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, parkour players, Adventurer

Game Overview: A warrior accidentally entered the Lego Canyon, which is full of various crises and opportunities. Please follow the warrior to explore the canyon together and become the final winner! Remember: the winner is the king.

Instructions: The objective of this game is parkour/avoid obstacles, and the goal is to touch the trophy to become the king！

RoderickCSG---Zhi Qu
